projects.title: Custom Product Shopware 6 e-commerce Platform
projects.description: Development of a custom products Shopware 6 shop with advanced customization options and targeted filtering. Utilizing CI container management for seamless deployments.

projects.title: Algolia Search Implementation
projects.description: Implementation of Algolia Search as an instant search engine for products and custom entities within Shopware 6.

projects.title: Instant Job PWA
projects.description: Design and development of a job placement and hiring platform with real-time map tracking and instant messaging capabilities. Emphasis placed on high software quality through extensive use of phpunit for test coverage and phpstan for static code analysis. Additionally, every component of the application was containerized using Docker and delivered in a scalable manner on the AWS cloud.
projects.stack: Symfony 6, PHP8, API Platform, AWS, Docker, VueJS

projects.title: Content-Driven Shopware 6 E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Development of a content-driven e-commerce platform using Shopware 6, earning recognition as one of the 10 most beautiful Shopware 6 shops. Features extensive content management modules for editor ease of use and compliance with CI standards.
